q.name: Gleaming Quill
q.description: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.

w.name: Grand Entrance
w.description: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.

e.name: Battle Dance
e.description: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.

r.name: The Quickness
r.description: Gains movement speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.

description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Rakan''' periodically generates a {{pp18|33|46|59|72|85|98|111|124|137|150|163|176|189|202|215|228|241|254|formula=20{{plus}}(13{{times}}level)}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}} {{tip|shield}}. Damaging an enemy {{tip|champion}} with a [[Basic attack|basic attack]] or [[Abilities|ability]] reduces the {{sti|cooldown}} of ''Fey Feathers'' by 1 second per champion hit.
If the shield is damaged, but not destroyed, it will regenerate 10% of its maximum value every second, after being out of combat for 5 seconds.

{{sbc|Lover's Leap:}} If either '''Rakan''' or {{ci|Xayah}} is {{si|Recall|recalling}}, the other may move nearby and activate their own recall to join them. '''Both''' reach base at the time of which the initiator's recall ends.
i1.name: Fey Feathers
notes: * {{ri|Revitalize}} will record bonus shielding when a new shield is created, but not when it regenerates. In either case, there's no bonus shielding received.

description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Rakan''' periodically generates a {{pp18|33|46|59|72|85|98|111|124|137|150|163|176|189|202|215|228|241|254|formula=20{{plus}}(13{{times}}level)}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}} {{tip|shield}}. Damaging an enemy {{tip|champion}} with a [[Basic attack|basic attack]] or [[Abilities|ability]] reduces the {{sti|cooldown}} of ''Fey Feathers'' by 1 second per champion hit.
If the shield is damaged, but not destroyed, it will regenerate 10% of its maximum value every second, after being out of combat for 5 seconds.

{{sbc|Lover's Leap:}} If either '''Rakan''' or {{ci|Xayah}} is {{si|Recall|recalling}}, the other may move nearby and activate their own recall to join them. '''Both''' reach base at the time of which the initiator's recall ends.
i2.name: Fey Feathers
notes: * {{ri|Revitalize}} will record bonus shielding when a new shield is created, but not when it regenerates. In either case, there's no bonus shielding received.

riot.name: Gleaming Quill
riot.description: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.
riot.tooltip:
Flings a magical feather that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy hit.

If the feather hits a champion or epic monster, Rakan restores {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health to himself and nearby allies after {{ e4 }} seconds or when he touches an ally.

q1.blurb: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rakan''' slings an enchanted feather forward, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to the first enemy hit.
If that enemy was a champion or epic [[monster]], an area is marked around '''Rakan'''.

After 3 seconds or if an ally champion comes within the marked area, '''Rakan''' {{tip|heals}} himself and surrounding allies by {{pp|18|18|24|30|36|42|48|54|60|66|72|78|84|90|96|102|108|114|120|displayformula=12 + (6{{times}}level)}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}}.
q1.name: Gleaming Quill
notes: * The trigger radius is slightly smaller than the heal radius.
* If the spell is blocked by a {{tip|Spell shield}}, the damage will be blocked, but '''Rakan''' will still be affected by the heal component.

riot.name: Grand Entrance
riot.description: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.
riot.tooltip: Dashes to a location. Upon arrival Rakan spirals into the air, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and knocking up enemies for {{ knockupduration }} second.

w1.blurb: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.
description: After a {{fd|0.35}}-second delay, he leaps into the air, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} surrounding enemies for 1 second.
w1.name: Grand Entrance
notes: * Rakan will stop mid-dash if he is immobilized by {{tip|crowd control}} effects during ''Grand Entrance''.

riot.name: Battle Dance
riot.description: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.
riot.tooltip:
Flies to an allied champion, granting them a {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health shield for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Can be re-cast at no cost once within {{ e2 }} seconds.

Battle Dance's cast range is increased when cast on Xayah.

e1.blurb: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rakan''' {{tip|dashes|leaps}} to an allied champion, {{tip|shield|shielding}} them for 3 seconds.
''Battle Dance'' can be re-cast for 5 seconds at no cost, and may select the same target again.
''If {{ci|Xayah}} is the target, Battle Dance is able to be cast from an increased range.''
e1.name: Battle Dance
notes: * ''Battle Dance'' will be {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} by any {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} crowd control.
* The shield does not stack when reapplied. Thus, jumping on an ally who's already shielded will only have their shield refreshed.
* If Rakan is knocked down, the target will not gain a shield but he still gains the ability to recast (if applicable).

riot.name: Battle Dance
riot.description: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.
riot.tooltip:
Flies to an allied champion, granting them a {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health shield for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Can be re-cast at no cost once within {{ e2 }} seconds.

Battle Dance's cast range is increased when cast on Xayah.

e2.blurb: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rakan''' {{tip|dashes|leaps}} to an allied champion, {{tip|shield|shielding}} them for 3 seconds.
''Battle Dance'' can be re-cast for 5 seconds at no cost, and may select the same target again.
''If {{ci|Xayah}} is the target, Battle Dance is able to be cast from an increased range.''
e2.name: Battle Dance
notes: * ''Battle Dance'' will be {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} by any {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} crowd control.
* The shield does not stack when reapplied. Thus, jumping on an ally who's already shielded will only have their shield refreshed.
* If Rakan is knocked down, the target will not gain a shield but he still gains the ability to recast (if applicable).

riot.name: The Quickness
riot.description: Gains movement speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.
riot.tooltip:
Gain {{ e5 }}% movement speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Touching enemies deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and charms them for {{ e3 }} second(s) the first time they're hit. The first champion charmed grants Rakan {{ e6 }}% decaying movement speed.

r1.blurb: Gains movement speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rakan''' breaks into a captivating sprint for 4 seconds, gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|50% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for the duration. During this, his {{sti|range|base attack range}} is reduced to 50, and collision with an enemy champion deals {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|charm|charms}} them, and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 75%. This may only occur once per enemy champion.
When '''Rakan''' collides with his first enemy champion he gains an additional {{sti|ms|{{as|150% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, decaying over {{tt|{{fd|1.5}}|Estimated}} seconds.
r1.name: The Quickness
notes: * '''Rakan''' can attack and use all of his other abilities, while ''The Quickness'' is active, although his attack range is reduced to 50 (67 with a charged {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}).
* The spell duration is increased by {{fd|0.25}} seconds per enemy hit.
